attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to: 'Stop selling off PRI shops within military Institutes turning them into Civillian shops !'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming apparent that Unit PRI's are being forced to close and tender being offered out to civilian businesses thus reducing the quality of eqpt on offer for higher prices where profits are reduced for the Unit to fund adventure training, sports eqpt etc. Please review this petition to enable the Forces, placed under such stressful times, to buy high quality
eqpt at a fair price and benefit in the long term in return.
